A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: What a disgrace that so many \"professional\" reviewers rated Last Jedi as \"fresh\"  Are they paid by Disney?  Or have they never seen a dramatic\, well-written\, well-acted movie?  Almost ANY television show from the space - sci-fi genre beats this by miles.  I had low expectations\, and it STILL bored me to tears\, with so many pointless\, drawn-out scenes that had ZERO dramatic impact\, and so much bad acting. The rebels were pathetic.  Even the bad guy was a wet noodle.   The force of good movie making is clearly not with Disney.  I miss George Lucas.  DO NOT WASTE YOUR TIME OR MONEY ON THIS.  No matter how low your expectations\, you will be disappointed.
